name: Frostjack
description: The Frostjack is a chilling medium-sized fey with a menacing presence, characterized by its ability to manipulate ice and cold.
memorable: Its chilling presence saps the strength of nearby foes and can freeze them solid.
goals: To sap the strength of foes, manipulate ice, and frustrate spellcasters.
relations: Commonly encountered with other fey creatures or in icy environments.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage and exhaustion, and advantage on spell saves.
attacks: Utilizes Ice Blade attacks and Winter’s Touch to inflict piercing and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Chilling Presence deals cold damage and can cause exhaustion to nearby creatures.
senses: It has a passive perception score of 17, allowing it to notice potential threats easily.
skills: Skilled in perception with a +3 modifier.
additional_information: Can extinguish unprotected flames and freeze water.
Can move across and climb icy surfaces effortlessly.
Can unleash an Icicle Barrage for devastating area damage.
Has a reaction to gain fire resistance.
Capable of inflicting a freezing condition on targets.
test_queries: chilling fey monster with ice abilities
mobile frost monster that freezes enemies
creature that deals cold damage and causes exhaustion
fey enemy with ice manipulation powers
neutral evil creature found in icy terrains
